book.synopsis: Two novellas: the first, a parody of medieval knighthood told by a nun; the second, a fantasy about a nobleman bisected into his good and evil halves. “Bravura pieces... executed with brilliance and brio”(Chicago Tribune). Translated by Archibald Colquhoun. A Helen and Kurt Wolff Book
book.title_long: The Nonexistent Knight and The Cloven Viscount
book.dimensions: Height: 7.8 Inches, Length: 5.35 Inches, Weight: 0.55 Pounds, Width: 0.64 Inches
